mapper.select: SELECT PF.* , PC.PHO_IMG AS LAST_PHOTO FROM PHOTO_FOLDER PF LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PC.FOLDER_NUM , MAX( PHO_NO ) ,MAX(PHO_IMG) PHO_IMG FROM PHOTO_CATEGORY PC GROUP BY PC.FOLDER_NUM ) PC ON PF.FOLDER_NUM = PC.FOLDER_NUM WHERE COUPLE_NUM = #{couple_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE photo_folder SET last_photo = ( SELECT MAX(PC.PHO_IMG) AS last_photo FROM ( SELECT FOLDER_NUM, MAX(PHO_NO) AS max_pho_no FROM PHOTO_CATEGORY GROUP BY FOLDER_NUM ) T INNER JOIN PHOTO_CATEGORY PC ON T.FOLDER_NUM = PC.FOLDER_NUM AND T.max_pho_no = PC.PHO_NO ) WHERE COUPLE_NUM = #{couple_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo_folder (id, couple_num, folder_name) VALUES (#{id}, #{couple_num}, #{folder_name} )
INSERT INTO photo_category (pho_img, pho_date, folder_num) values(#{pho_img}, sysdate, #{folder_num})
insert into photo_category (pho_img, folder_num) select #{pho_img}, pf.folder_num from photo_folder pf where pf.folder_num = #{folder_num}
